snippet: Many Americans favor enforcing gun control laws that actually are not on the books.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Joel Benenson, head of Benenson Strategy Group, and Katie Connolly, senior associate there, calls attention to polls that reveal slight majority of Americans consistently say that we need better enforcement of our gun laws but that many do not really know what American's gun laws are.

byline.original: By JOEL BENENSON and KATIE CONNOLLY

lead_paragraph: Many Americans favor enforcing gun control laws that actually are not on the books.

headline.seo: Don’t Know Much About Gun Laws
headline.main: Don’t Know Much About Gun Laws
headline.print_headline: Don’t Know Much About Gun Laws
